# C++ Best Practices

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/c-best-practices
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/c-best-practices
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install c-best-practices
c-best-practices <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g c-best-practices
c-best-practices <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
